title: Azdi Bastak
data: Azdi Bastak (Persian: روستاى ازدي) is a village in Hormozgan Province in the south of Iran. Azdi Bastak is a small village from Central District (Persian: بخش مركزى) in the  city of Bastak (Bastak County شهرستان بستک) Hormozgan Province. 27°05′12″N 54°29′26″E﻿ / ﻿27.0867°N 54.4906°E﻿ / 27.0867; 54.4906 This Bastak County location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
